code:
stateDiagram

    Null --> Precommitted: PreCommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Committed: CommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Deleted: CronPreCommitExpiry (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Committed --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Committed --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (Infra_LoadBalancer)\nProvingDeadline (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Committed --> Terminated: TerminateSectors\n(Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Faulty --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (Infra_RedisCache)
    Faulty --> Faulty: ProvingDeadline (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Faulty --> Recovering: DeclareFaultRecovered
    Faulty --> Terminated: EarlyExpiration (Infra_RedisCache)\nTerminateSectors (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Recovering --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Recovering --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nProvingDeadline (Infra_RedisCache)
    Recovering --> Terminated: TerminateSectors (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    Active --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Active --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (Infra_RedisCache)\nProvingDeadline (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Active --> Terminated: CronExpiration\nTerminateSectors (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    Terminated --> Deleted: CompactSectors
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
